snippet: A federal judge in Utah refused to prevent a rival of Myriad Genetics from offering offer a test similar to Myriad’s for two genes tied to breast cancer.
abstract: United States District Court Judge Robert J Shelby refuses to prevent Ambry Genetics, rival of Myriad Genetics, from offering test similar to Myriad’s for two genes tied to breast cancer.
lead_paragraph: A federal judge in Utah refused to prevent a rival of Myriad Genetics from offering offer a test similar to Myriad’s for two genes tied to breast cancer.

headline.main: Patentholder on Breast Cancer Tests Denied Injunction in Lawsuit
headline.print_headline: Patentholder on Breast Cancer Tests Denied Injunction in Lawsuit
